descriptionHtml:
----------------------
Follower [Julius]
----------------------

I'm sorry, but I do not understand English that well.

----------------------
[Character]
Name : Julius
Place: Seven Thousand Steps / Near the Etched Tablet[Emblem III]
Race : Nord(Dragonborn)
- Marriageable
- Undead alignment

[Shout]
･Dragonrend
･Fire Breath
･Frost Breath
･Dragon Aspect
  Effective when the player's HP decreases below 50% or is Julius' HP decreases below 30%.
  Loses effect when HP is restored over that line.
[u][b]
!!!ATTENTION!!![/b][/u]
I have added the Dragon Imprisonment Ring to the initial ewuipment of the follower.
Uses Slot 61.
If the effect for the Dragon Aspect does not disappear, please re-equip the Dragon Imprisonment Ring.

----------------------

･Addition of Non-Dragonborn Version

- Difference to the normal version
- Does not use Dragon Aspect
- Do not have the Dragon Imprisonment Ring

----------------------

[Option]
Please add the change in appearance from the Optional file.
After downloading the Optional file, please over wright it.

Ex-Whiterun Guard, but his appearance changed when his powers and a Dragonborn awakened.
Since then, he lives in High Hrothgar, away from anybody.
I changed his appearance based on this story.  (ears, fangs, eye color, etc.)
I have added the normal appearance in the options.
Please over write at your preference.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/64918-1-1432472562.png[/img]

----------------------

[Julius_Child-Ales-]

[u][b]!!Requirement!!
DLC[Hearthfire][/b][/u]
[u][b]There are some cautious, so please install only after reading the Read Me.[/b][/u]

[Profile]
Name: Ales
Place: Dragon's Reach

I have added Julius' adapted son.

Ales may be used alone with installing “Follower-Julius”,
but I created Ales as a bonus of Julius,
so he has not been elaborately created as Julius.

[u][b]!!Warning!![/b][/u]
He has been created as an additional race, so he is not compatible to children clothes.
An error might occur if you give him children clothes.
 (He might appear naked and/or some parts may look transparent.)

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/64918-0-1433666931.png[/img]

----------------------

[change log]
･v1.3
Changed the location to the "Third Sculpture Slate" at the Seven Thousand Steps.  Changed the facial mesh and the initial equipment.

･v1.21
I changed the Mesh/texture of the body shape.  Deleted unnecessary Faction. Addition of Non-Dragonborn Version

･v1.2
balance adjusting(combat)
　（If you think he is too strong,please adjust any of the follower's overhaul mods.）

----------------------

[Recommended Mods]
・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light [/url]by tktk
・Any of the follower overhaul mods
